snippet: Campbell Soup is recalling 355,000 cans of SpaghettiOs Original in the United States because of a possible choking hazard.
abstract: Campbell Soup is recalling 355,000 cans of SpaghettiOs Original in United States because plastic has been found in some cans.
lead_paragraph: Campbell Soup is recalling 355,000 cans of SpaghettiOs Original in the United States because of a possible choking hazard.

headline.main: Spaghettios Recall: Plastic Pieces Found in Some Cans
headline.print_headline: Spaghettios Recall: Plastic Pieces Found in Some Cans
